text: Battaglini is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Francesco Battaglini (1823–1892), Italian cardinal *Giuseppe Battaglini (1826–1894), Italian mathematician *Marco Battaglini (1645–1717), Italian jurist and priest ==See also== *8155 Battaglini, a main-belt asteroid Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Battaglini
